setLightSchedule.title: Adjust light schedule
setLightSchedule.description: Configure the daily photoperiod for this zone per SEC §4.2.

onHours.label: Lights on
onHours.help: Hours per day that fixtures remain on.

offHours.label: Lights off
offHours.help: Hours per day that fixtures remain off.

startHour.label: Start hour
startHour.help: Hour of the day when the light cycle begins (0-23.75).

validation.start: Start hour must be between 0 and 23.75 inclusive.
